hero.title: [NL] The Ultimate Discord Bot
hero.subtitle: [NL] Powerful moderation, fun commands, and endless customization for your server.

features.title: [NL] Features
features.subtitle: [NL] Everything you need to manage and enhance your Discord server

moderation.title: [NL] Moderation
moderation.description: [NL] Powerful tools to keep your server safe with auto-moderation, warnings, and more.

fun.title: [NL] Fun Commands
fun.description: [NL] Games, jokes, memes, and interactive commands to keep your community engaged.

leveling.title: [NL] Leveling System
leveling.description: [NL] Reward active members with points, levels, and custom ranks.

extensions.title: [NL] Custom Extensions
extensions.description: [NL] Create or install custom commands and features from our marketplace.

music.title: [NL] Music
music.description: [NL] High-quality music playback with DJ controls and audio filters.

ai.title: [NL] AI Chat
ai.description: [NL] Intelligent conversations powered by multiple AI providers.

cta.title: [NL] Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: [NL] Add {{botName}} to your server in seconds.

faq.title: [NL] Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: [NL] Yes! All core features are completely free. Premium tiers unlock extras like Music and AI chat.
faq.q2: [NL] How do I set up the bot?
faq.a2: [NL] Click 'Add to Server', select your server, and you're done! Use the dashboard to customize.
faq.a3: [NL] Extensions are custom commands you can create or install from the community gallery.

servers.title: [NL] Select a Server
servers.noServers: [NL] You don't have any servers to manage.

membership.title: [NL] Premium Membership
membership.subtitle: [NL] Unlock powerful features for your server

403.title: [NL] Access Denied
403.message: [NL] You don't have permission to access this page.

404.title: [NL] Page Not Found
404.message: [NL] The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

500.title: [NL] Server Error
500.message: [NL] Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
